description: This file defines the DataService class, which provides mock data fetching methods for a music streaming application. It includes methods to fetch trending tracks, recommended albums, search results, user playlists, and playlist tracks, all with simulated network delays.

classes.name: DataService
classes.description: A mock data provider class for retrieving music-related data such as tracks, albums, playlists, and search results. Designed to be replaced with real API integration.

methods.name: DataService()
methods.description: Constructor for DataService, currently constants only, indicating a stateless service mock.

methods.name: fetchTrendingTracks
methods.description: Returns a list of mock trending track data after a short delay.

methods.name: fetchRecommendedAlbums
methods.description: Returns a list of mock recommended album data after a short delay.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a mock search returning result items based on the query string.

methods.name: fetchUserPlaylists
methods.description: Returns a list of mock user playlist data.

methods.name: fetchPlaylistTracks
methods.description: Returns a list of tracks for a given playlist ID.
